title: AI Art Ethics
description: A comprehension handout exploring the ethical dimensions of AI-generated art.
learningIntentions: Understand the key ethical issues surrounding AI art.
successCriteria: I can identify three ethical concerns and explain my viewpoint on them.

title: The Dawn Raids
description: A comprehension handout about the Dawn Raids in New Zealand history.
learningIntentions: Understand the historical context and impact of the Dawn Raids.
successCriteria: I can explain what the Dawn Raids were and who they affected.

title: Writer's Toolkit: The Hook
description: A handout on how to write an effective 'hook' to engage readers in a piece of writing.
learningIntentions: Learn different techniques for writing a compelling opening.
successCriteria: I can write three different types of hooks for a given topic.
requiredMaterials: A web browser and a word processor.
